animeTitle: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! 2: Kono Subarashii Geijutsu ni Shukufuku wo!
animeDescription: Kazuma meets a novice adventurer called Ran who claims to be Kazuma's fan. A quest is proposed to Kazuma and his party in front of Ran, so he accepts the quest to look good in front of his fan; after some convincing, they all go to fight the metal golem.  (Source: Wikipedia)
animeCharacters: ['Megumin', 'Satou, Kazuma', 'Aqua', 'Dustiness Ford, Lalatina', 'Komekko', 'Luna', 'Head Researcher', 'Mitsurugi, Kyouya', 'Ran', 'Bishoujo Golem']
animeVoices: ['Takahashi, Rie', 'Fukushima, Jun', 'Amamiya, Sora', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Hara, Sayuri', 'Cho', 'Eguchi, Takuya', 'Akasaki, Chinatsu', 'Nabatame, Hitomi']
